title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Culturally Responsive Approaches to Enhance Cultural Inclusivity in Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three cultural bias elements in online environments.
Learners design one educational resource applying culturally responsive pedagogy.
Learners implement at least two online interaction strategies that accommodate learners from diverse backgrounds.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
